extendedInfo.description: Note: This supports the Nook Color only. It will not work with the Nook Tablet*This app is not compatible with CM9 or CM10. I have no plans to release an app that is compatible with CM9/CM10 but other developers are trying to bring similar functionality in the future.A small simple app to tweak a rooted Nook Color running the CM7 kernel(nightly 88+) or Dalingrin's OC kernel. This app allows control for:-CPU clock rate per stepping-Voltage control-USB Host mode control-U-Boot settings-External speaker volume-Heaphones volume-DAC gain-Display bit depthMore features to come...*Only for Nook Color. Need kernel support for volume and CPU clock rate adjustments. *For audio adjustments you must have a recent 2.6.32 kernel on CM7 or Dalingrin's OC kernel for CM7 or rooted B&N Froyo 1.2*For CPU adjustments you must have Dalingrin's overclock kernel from 06/09/11 or later.*Voltage control requires Dalingrin's overclock kernel from 06/30/11 or later.

reviews.title: Perfect Volume for cases, and Adjustable OC
reviews.comment: I love it, Excellent work!, This Nook Color Becomes more and more awesome every day :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Offers help to more advanced users
reviews.comment: By giving you the power to bring Nook to your way. USB HOST, Voltage regulator, more powerful sound , what more to ask!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Geat app (after I set it up correctly)
reviews.comment: I had nc running on cm7 stable off of a sd card for several weeks now. Loaded this and now nook boots into cm7 for a couple of seconds and then straight into nook os.  What is up with this?  Thought sd card boot was fixed for this.  Update. 1/19/12  This app does work great it was my mistake.  I had checked the box to have it always boot to the eMMC so it always booted to nook color.  After I went in and unchecked this box it works great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome! Thank you. Got my Nook up to 1300 MHz and it\'s stable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great functionality with CM7
reviews.comment: Needs support for Ice Cream Sandwich 4.0.

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: I installed this app, and it worked fine for a while.  Headphone jack sounded louder & clearer.  Tried overclocking, though, and now my NC will not stay in Android for longer than 20-30 secs after booting. It reboots to standard Nook s/w on it\'s own.  I downloaded the latest Nook Color Update yesterday, perhaps that is the problem.  Either way it has \"neutered\

reviews.title: 1.4.1 doesn\'t work! It just black screen
reviews.comment: 1.4.0 works fine, but 1.4.1 just seem to crash.... its asks for root and just sits there with a dark screen... tried rebooting and everything...

reviews.title: Holy crap, awesome!!
reviews.comment: Running CM7 on a nook color - volume output DRAMATICALLY improved on headphones and on the wimpy little internal speaker, both movies (brought over as Handbrake-created MP4s using the iPod Touch preset) and music (MP3s ripped from CDs, downloaded from iTunes, ripped from vinyl). Unbelievable. Magic.
